title: Gorgeous No Bank Waterfront Home
posting_body: Gorgeous No Bank Waterfront home on Rockaway Beach with beautifully maintained grounds.
This home includes a beautifully upgraded converted garage 2 story apartment that boasts water views from the upstairs loft.
Immediately take in the water and Seattle views upon walking into to this home.
There are 3 bedrooms upstairs each with its own gorgeous views, the primary room and bath is located on the main floor with french doors to its own little private patio.
Home comes with 2 1/2 bathrooms, 2 fireplaces, large open kitchen, hardwood floors, nice large family room off kitchen, outdoor built in fire pit, entry way pond, storage area and much more...
Pets are negotiable with owner approval, pet screening and additional deposit.
This home is definitely a must see before its rented.
For additional information and pictures please visit our website <URL>
